website_summaries.verdict: Small but mighty fan that cools and refreshes the room it's in quickly.
pros: Nine inches in diameter, yet circulates air in an entire room with ease
Saves both time and costs compared to other cooling devices
High marks for its ability to impact air temperature and operate quietly as well
cons: Great for small areas but not ideal for spaces upwards of 90 feet

customer_reviews.title: POOR QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: I remember the VORNADO FAN I "previously" owned. Best described as Excellent. Made right here in the USA. I didn't see the "made in China" anywhere on the description else I would not have purchased this Fan. I did some checking online I and found Vornado sold Company to China in August 2014. So far 79,000 Vornado electrical products have bee RECALLED. In my opinion AMAZON has lost it's credibility with me
customer_reviews.author: Margitta Glenn

customer_reviews.title: Major quality issues.
customer_reviews.text: First of all this fan is louder than all get out. Second it is not made well. The front face kept falling off. I have two of these from many years before and they are much higher quality. Yes, the motor move the fan quickly and gives you lots of wind in your face. The quality of the product is definitely lower than it was before.
customer_reviews.author: Pamazon

customer_reviews.title: (100+ degree days in Sacramento) I had purchased a cheap box fan to put at the top of the stairs to draw the cool air up
customer_reviews.text: Life changer! We live in an old house and the heat definitely rose to the second floor.(100+ degree days in Sacramento) I had purchased a cheap box fan to put at the top of the stairs to draw the cool air up. It helped, But not much. This Turbo Fan is killing it this summer! The temperature degree difference between upstairs and downstairs is about 7 degrees instead of the 16 we were experiencing last year. Relief!
customer_reviews.author: Tricia Slavik

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Its a little louder than i would have preferred and a little bigger(as it was to replace my fiances nightstand can, however it looks to be made of high quality materials and definitely circulates the air. I'm probably going to freeze but I think he will be thrilled about it.
customer_reviews.author: Sierra

customer_reviews.title: Moves air well
customer_reviews.text: This fan is small, but really moves air around well. This fan is best used sitting somewhere, not just pointed right at you. It circulates the air around the room.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon L

customer_reviews.title: Totally Cool!
customer_reviews.text: I had a similar Vornado fan that, after five years, blew out. I used it constantly and know Vornado is the top name in fans so I knew I wanted another one. My original model is no longer available so I bought this slightly bigger version and I love it! I keep it on along with my air conditioner and it makes my bedroom an absolute icebox! Perfect for the hot summer days that have already plagued NYC. Cannot recommend this highly enough!
customer_reviews.author: Brian Scott Mednick

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Junk
customer_reviews.text: Avoid Vornado products! Fan stopped working after around 3 months after purchase. I contacted Vornado more than 2 weeks ago to get support under warranty but still have not received a response. I have another Vornado heater that I bought at Costco, and it also has failed. Cheap junk!
customer_reviews.author: Katherine E. Stein

customer_reviews.title: The power fan
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I love this Vornado 630 portable fan. It’s not to big and not to small, just perfect size, and it has a lot of power, you can see the fan circulating the air. We are full time RVers and the heat in Florida is impossible to just count on your A/C... we bought our first Vornado 630 in Home Depot, it worked so well it kept the house cooler by 10 degrees in the the living area. So we decided to buy another Vornado for the bedroom. We keep both Vornado Fans running and it’s so cold I have to lower the A/C...
customer_reviews.author: Yolanda

customer_reviews.title: Weird noise
customer_reviews.text: I sleep with a fan to block out noise. I was really excited to get a strong fan with loud white noise. The fan was very powerful with loud white noise but had a weird high pitch pulsating sound in background that was very distracting. I returned it and bought a $ 13 regular fan.
customer_reviews.author: Troy

customer_reviews.title: Great Fan
customer_reviews.text: I love this fan. I had bought the smaller version because it's cheaper, didn't want to spend the money. I have an office space on the second floor of my home that the air gets stuffy so I just need to circulate the air more. This fan, even on low speed, is a great air circulator. I have the smaller version in my bed room and it barely suffices so if you are trying to decide between the smaller version and this mid-size version, go for this one, you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: connie c

customer_reviews.title: Powerful Fan
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't happy spending this much on a simple fan, but I tend to keep things for a long time, as long as they hold up. This fan will pay for itself in this older home which gets rather warm inside when the temps outside reach the lower 80s. It circulates the air completely around the room. I tried it while the heater was on and the fan overpowered the heater. I was hoping it would help circulate the heat from the higher ceilings. It didn't. It was easy to take the grid off to clean. It has multiple positions and the power switch is on the leg which I like.
customer_reviews.author: onlyHischild

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Highly recommend but not too quiet unfortunately.
customer_reviews.text: I love it. No remote and it is pretty damn loud but it works for me. I use it to sleep but must be on lowest setting no matter where you put it if you plan to use it for sleep; even then probably not good for normal people, I enjoy the white noise but it probably isn’t good for my ears long-term (only using short-term though). It works great as a fan though - very powerful. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Has Great Cooling, but a little louder than expected.
customer_reviews.text: This fan worked great for keeping my 10x10 room cool, however the sound it produced from the airflow was a bit louder than what I was comfortable with so I always kept it on the lowest setting. I was beginning to get used it it, but unfortunately, I ended up returning the item and getting a Vornado 660 instead for the reduced noise. If noise isn't a factor for you or you are not sensitive to noise, this works great! P.S. The noise level in my house is lower than average (pretty quiet) and I prefer a lower white noise sound level when sleeping, which might be the reason why I opted for the 660.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge

customer_reviews.title: Very good fan
customer_reviews.text: Very nice design and very powerfull. We have been using it every night for a few weeks at the minimum speed and works perfect. I'm using it with a tp-link smart plug so I can control it trough my Alex, works like a charm, I can even create a schedule for it to turn on and off automatically at night. Didn't know this brand before and saw they selling another version at Costco, really nice. It is also compact yet strong, so it is a very good product. Nice finish and quality as well. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Brazilian Rockstar

customer_reviews.title: For those people who rely on real opinion
customer_reviews.text: I love this fan, it really works, especially if you have hot flashes. I sit right in front of it and it cool me off. They said it will cool off the whole room, I don't think so, but having the fan blowing on you when it's 90 degrees outside, it really help, it worked. It a small size but powerful and putting it on the dresser and having blowing on the bed, just great. Hope this help.
customer_reviews.author: Letty

customer_reviews.title: Ineffective, expensive, noisy
customer_reviews.text: I decided to buy this fan based on the glowing review it received from Wirecutter. In hindsight, I'll be more skeptical of their reviews. This fan is weak, loud, and worst of all, expensive. It claims to circulate air around even a large room. But it doesn't, at all. It creates a weak breeze in a small room. It's fine if its blowing directly at you, but it doesn't impact the rest of the room or help cool it. Given how weak its air flow is, it makes an astounding amount of noise. Enough that I had to increase the TV volume by a significant amount. I will likely return this purchase, and would not recommend it to others.
customer_reviews.author: J.W.

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality from Vornado
customer_reviews.text: I have several different Vornado fans and a small space heater. They all have excellent industrial design and build quality. This mid-sized fan is infinitely adjustable for angle (with no knobs to loosen/tighten), the speed adjustment switch is conveniently-placed on the side (not on the back) and the unit has small rubber pads for placement on hardwood or tile floors (very thoughtful). One of my other Vornado fans died at 5 years and a few days; Vornado sent me a new one under warranty with no drama. Excellent products, excellent company.
customer_reviews.author: D. B. Smith

customer_reviews.title: What CFM?
customer_reviews.text: I read a lot on this and my wife said get a cheap box fan, i wanted to try it Turns out she was spot on. The volume and CFM of this device does not reflect its price. I hope the motor is strong and if it can last 10 years i might use it for specific reasons (on me while in the Jacuzzi). I like the cheap Lasko circular fans with remotes much better and they keep me much cooler while circulating more air.
customer_reviews.author: T. Porter

customer_reviews.title: A box fan works just as well...
customer_reviews.text: So I bought this at the recommendation of a friend, and it's a nice fan, but I wouldn't say it cools anymore than a box fan that you can get it rite aid for a quarter of the price. The advantages that it's smaller than a box fan, but it's almost just as noisy. I'd go for the box fan I think and be able to buy four of them for the same cost.
customer_reviews.author: aaa

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly, An Improvement over the older model
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased the previous medium sized Vornado used and used it constantly for nearly 10 years either in a bedroom or living room. So far this newer model with its tilting base where there was none before, on/off switch on the side instead of the back, smaller overall size and seemingly more power... perhaps I should have bought this newer model sooner. There's a reason why these fans are so highly rated. They're really THAT good.
customer_reviews.author: Oy Vey

customer_reviews.title: Great for keeping my animal cool
customer_reviews.text: So far so great. Being black it is quite unobtrusive. It has 3 set speeds and I'd prefer if it just upped when I turn the knob but I can't really complain. It has worked consistently for hours. Its main job has been keeping my pet cool and circulating the air in her room. She likes to sit in front of it which makes me happy and means it meets here need to cool off in the hot weather. It creates white noise which increases the more powerful the fan but it isn't too bad. Certainly quieter than the air conditioner. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Deirdre Ni Chonaill

customer_reviews.title: Died After 2 Months
customer_reviews.text: This fan worked really good this summer in July and August when it was hot. Then we had really hot winds and conditions in mid-october and used it for maybe an hour. The next time I went to turn it on that same evening, it was broken. I tried different Outlets. Nothing. This thing is dead in the water after using only a couple of months.
customer_reviews.author: Cocoanlace

customer_reviews.title: It's a fan, just like any other fan but more expensive.
customer_reviews.text: Vornado wants you to think they've got some secret sauce to moving air over long distances. They don't. I bought this fan in the hopes of replacing a blower I use to move air upstairs to a loft that doesn't get enough air conditioning. I wanted something quiet, effective and better looking than my current solution ( Well, it was better looking and maybe a bit quieter but only because it wasn't moving nearly as much air. Returned after a couple of days. As another reviewer put it, "Don't drink the Kool-Aid."
customer_reviews.author: MG-Austin

customer_reviews.title: ABSOLUTELY RECOMMENDABLE!!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolute LOVE my Vornado Fan. I received it 2 days ago and I live in a tropical constantly hot climate and have burned through a lot of regular fans which I always have to sit in front of to get relief. This fan is the BOMB!! It is almost like having an air condition. I am so content, I can't tell you and I am a real sweat generating person. Sooooo...One of the best buys I have made. And by the way, I did do my homework and researched 'reviews' and recommendations before I made my decision. So thank you very much inventor and manufacturer of this fabulous fan.
customer_reviews.author: JL

customer_reviews.title: WORTH IT!
customer_reviews.text: My central air conditioning went out and while I was waiting for the air conditioner tech to get to my appointment date, this really kept me cool. My brother in law had one and swears by it. I thought the price was steep but, it's not like I ever go out and buy fans often. Purchased as per my bro in law's recommendation and haven't doubted it. Can be loud if you put on the highest setting. I can still fall asleep to it rather then being hot , uncomfortable and unable to get a good night's rest. Highly recommend this product. Keep airs flowing througout the room
customer_reviews.author: M Allen

customer_reviews.title: Best Fan Ever...kinda
customer_reviews.text: Not much motion in where to point the fan, such as down. It’s relatively loud if on medium or high. Low sounds like a regular floor fan. Pros: this thing will circulate a room like a boss. One A.C. unit in our window with this fan in front of it circulates 800sq ft. Yes, you can feel the focused airflow from 20+ feet away. Overall USABILITY 10/10 Overall everything 9/10 I might be a fan of the lasting electronics from the 90s, but this is all plastic as with most things nowadays. I can’t see this product lasting more than a couple years. We’ll see! Worth it so far!
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: CIRCULATES AIR AS THOUGH IT WERE TWICE ITS SIZE
customer_reviews.text: THIS FAN HAS BEEN A PLEASANT SURPRISE. IT DOES A GREAT JOB CIRCULATING THE AIR THROUGHOUT THE ROOM. IT IS ALSO EXTREMELY QUIET. IT TAKES UP VERY LITTLE SPACE AND DOES NOT SHIMMY OR VIBRATE OUT OF PLACE. I HAVE BEEN USING IT IN OUR RV AS WELL AS AT HOME. I HIGHLY RECOMMEND THIS FAN. THE PRICE IS REASONABLE; I HAVE PAID MORE FOR A LOT LESS IN THE PAST.
customer_reviews.author: BarbaraAnn

customer_reviews.title: Love this brand
customer_reviews.text: Vornado always delivers, so I own others of this brand. Bought the small one to use when cooking so I could easily store it when not in use. Did not come with a remote so not sure why this asks for a rating on that. Fan can easily be angled upward so that it doesn't blow directly on food preparation or the gas cooktop. Helps to circulate the air in a 15' x 20' kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Tippy

customer_reviews.title: Pricey, but high quality
customer_reviews.text: Works pretty well for my needs. It's not entirely silent (I'm not sure that's even possible for a bladed fan) but it is definitely one of the quietest fans I've ever owned, and I personally don't mind the sound of it since I find I prefer a little white noise in the background while I sleep anyway. My room is only about 100 square feet, so it moves the air around well enough to cause it to feel noticeably cooler, which will definitely be useful in summer. It is a bit pricier than I would have preferred, but it's still an excellent fan, and feels much sturdier than any cheaper ones I've owned in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Denko-Chan

customer_reviews.title: The quality standard fan that both my Sister and I buy for our homes...
customer_reviews.text: I read the negative reviews just shaking my head, cause I have no idea what they are talking about. This medium-size room fan is the standard fan that my Sister and I both buy because of their superior quality, noticeably more air they move than much larger cheap fans, and they do so quietly. What sound they do make is a very pleasant white-noise to sleep by. Buy a quality fan like this one if it fits your budget. Very nice size, I would almost call it compact compared to standard, cheap, Walmart fans. I put one at the front of my garage to blow cooler outside air in while working on my car, and it works great. Cheers!
customer_reviews.author: George Carlin's ‘Stuff’

customer_reviews.title: The BEAST!
customer_reviews.text: This fan is a monster. Went above and beyond my expectations. Very well built, easy to use, and POWERFUL! Close your eyes and buy it if you need a quick relief and a cold breeze of air in this hot summer. Yes, the white noise puts me in a deep sleep every night. I should have bought this earlier. Happy happy happy!
customer_reviews.author: Kunal

customer_reviews.title: Weak Fan
customer_reviews.text: These used to be good powerful fans. This fan can’t circulate air more than 20 ft on the highest setting, much less 70 ft. Not worth the price. Weak motor!!!
customer_reviews.author: Vocalion

customer_reviews.title: Rip off
customer_reviews.text: I bought this fan based on the tons and tons of positive reviews, which made me feel justified spending $60 on such a small fan. Unfortunately it did not live up to my expectations. In all honesty, its a regular damn fan. Point it where you want the air to blow, there is no rotation, no super duper "air circulation", nothing to justify buying this over a standard fan for 20-30$. I ended up returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Daria

customer_reviews.title: Stuff hits the fan
customer_reviews.text: i have to admit i tend to be a bit on the thrifty side. So it took a bit for me to spend a lot on a smaller fan. i haven't regretted it yet. i live in an old garage apt in Texas. It gets hot in summer. This fan moves a lot of air and is quite. today's box fans move more noise than air it seems not like the good old days. This fan is worth the investment it definitely runs all summer long and a lot in winter to move the heat from my old gas flamed heater. So take it from a thrifty guy its worth the investment
customer_reviews.author: Brian B.

customer_reviews.title: WOW
customer_reviews.text: This fan is spectacular. It's expensive and I initially balked at the price, but in a large room with just a window AC unit it makes a huge difference making the space feel cool and moving a lot of air with minimal noise. I also have a knockoff version from Home Depot that moves quite a bit of air at a much lower price point, but it isn't nearly as quiet or well made and sometimes rattles when on high. The Vornado is smooth and quiet.
customer_reviews.author: B4E1

customer_reviews.title: Motor emits a horrible squealing whine
customer_reviews.text: Out of the box, my fan’s motor emitted a horribly loud squealing whine at especially scary levels on the high setting. I ended up disassembling the fan and tightened all of the screws on the motor. After being reassembled, the fan worked well through the summer before beginning to whine again. Honestly, the build quality ain’t great but—when working—the fan quietly and significantly moves air
customer_reviews.author: Greg Plancich

customer_reviews.title: Good air flow, seems quite well built
customer_reviews.text: Strong, directional air flow. I let it run day and night. I took off one star because it’s not super quiet, although it is by no means loud for the amount of air it moves. I’d definitely buy another one if I ever needed a second fan.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Ferry

customer_reviews.title: Noisy
customer_reviews.text: I like that this fan can tilt towards the ceiling; and it puts out a lot of air; but it is NOT quiet. For most , it would be too noisy for the bedroom. With other noise in the room, it may be okay, but otherwise it is too loud, even on low. The on-off dial is on the lower side - a little awkward - and first position is High, so you have to move through all speeds to get to low.
customer_reviews.author: GraceAlone

customer_reviews.title: An amazing fan.
customer_reviews.text: This has been my favorite style of Vornado for a long time. Rubber feet, can be set anywhere, and the fan itself blows a lot of air. It tilts easily, and it is also able to be cleaned easily. The noise level is about perfect. I didn't want a silent fan, and this one on the lowest settings is fairly quiet. High settings provides a lot of air, and can get a little noisy. It also looks nice and performs well smoothly. These fans have a good warranty, and I don't expect any major issues.
customer_reviews.author: CrankTop Contributor: Rock Music

customer_reviews.title: A bit louder than I'd like
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Vornado fan. My first one is a smaller unit, bought about 10 years ago. It's a little smaller but A LOT quieter than this larger Vornado 630 fan. I keep the 630 in my bedroom, and I can only use the "low" fan setting, as the higher settings are a bit too loud for a bedroom at night. But it does its job in keeping the room a little cooler at night.
customer_reviews.author: But It's a Dry Rain

customer_reviews.title: I'm a fan of these breezy fans.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second fan. Love them both. I use them to help cool my medium-sized one-level house with two window AC units on opposite sides. Even at low speed they work very well. I also used one a few days ago at the county fair where my work had a booth set up, and on the HIGH speed it really helped us feel cooler in 90-ish degree heat. These may be pricey compared to other fans, but I think they're worth it. My first one I've had for 2+ years now and it's still going strong.
customer_reviews.author: T-Bone

customer_reviews.title: Strong, sturdy, and minimum noise.
customer_reviews.text: I would have given that product even 10 stars. this fan is a miracle. you feel that you have an air conditioner in your room. I have it on the floor in my bedroom and I just tilt it to face all the way up. although it doesn't move around, it burst the air all around the room. I bought the same one years ago, and still as strong as is. Now, I'm buying a second one for another room. the package arrived in a perfect condition. I use on the lowest speed and it is enough for me.
customer_reviews.author: Janette

customer_reviews.title: Really moves the air!
customer_reviews.text: My kids have this in their room. Their room is that one room in the house we can’t seem to get the air conditioning balanced so they are always hot. They say this fan helps a lot. They of course leave it on everyday when they leave for school & I go turn it off. I’ve noticed it’s always been on low. So low power has been enough to move the air in their bedroom. I’m considerimg buying a smaller one & using this one in our family room.
customer_reviews.author: Silly Nilly

customer_reviews.title: its just a fan
customer_reviews.text: I have a $15 fan that is just as powerful, quiet and does the same (blows air). the whole circulator fan thing is complete BS. it does seem to have good construction. not sure if it's worth the price
customer_reviews.author: attilakb

customer_reviews.title: NOT WORTH THE PRICE!
customer_reviews.text: This fan moves a moderate amount of air, and the one I received is quiet (unlike some reviews), but it is not worth the high price relative to its performance. Maybe if it made more noise it would also work better! It is described as a " Whole Room Air Circulator", which would only be true only for a very small room. I would not trust this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Topnife

customer_reviews.title: The vortex concept really works
customer_reviews.text: The vortex concept really works. I was a little skeptical but having had this for a day now I can confirm this fan does cover a lot more area and noticeably works better than many of the cheaper fans I've owned over my lifetime. The price feels high to me but at the same time I don't think I've ever owned a fan this good. I'm impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Koop

customer_reviews.title: Work for only 61 nights......
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this fan June 2nd and it worked like it should. But yesterday, Aug 10th , it quit. Didn’t make it through the summer. Didn’t even need cleaning.. it worked 61 days. $1.15/day is pretty high for something as simple as a fan.. My old smaller one 4-5 years old used every night is still working. Disappointed to say the least.
customer_reviews.author: bird lover

customer_reviews.title: Great fan!
customer_reviews.text: The noise level is better than most fans but it could still be quieter in my opinion. I don't use the remote at all so I did not rate that. It is easy to move around, not heavy. But let me tell you, the AIR!! The flow of air is amazing!! I had bought one before and this is my second one in the house. I love them both and the air flow cuts down on the ac usage which really helps to lower my electric bill. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Bantie

customer_reviews.title: Underwhelming at best
customer_reviews.text: It's just a fan. Noisy as the rest, and probably doesn't move any more air than any other 12" fan. I bought into the hype and I'm out $65 for a $15 fan. Don't be like me.
customer_reviews.author: Artful Codger

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This little fan moves some major air and is not loud at all. I always have fans going around my house and have up until now used box fans from Walmart. This little guy is quiet and really moves the air around, I will be replacing my box fans with different sizes of this fan throughout my home, it is fantastic!!!
customer_reviews.author: Emme

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: Tried a few other types of fans, and this is by far, the best. We have no a/c and live in a tropical climate. So these really help make the nights bearable, especially sleeping. We had to get 2 for the master bedroom, one for each side. They are noisy on the highest setting, and didn’t come with a remote, but overall they work way better than the tower fans for airflow, and better than the ceiling fans too!
customer_reviews.author: AC

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, cools even in 100F heat
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this little fan. The noise level is really low, I'd say only the highest setting starts to get a little noisy. It keeps our bedroom just a few degrees cooler and moves cool air from the hall into the room. Even when it's not facing me I can feel some of the wind from it. My husband has dropped it and knocked it over a few times and it still works like new.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis McInnis

customer_reviews.title: vornado does an excellent job doing that
customer_reviews.text: vornado and myself are old friends; living in an old farm house without much insulation results in problems with spreading cooling and heating through out. vornado does an excellent job doing that. it has reduced my a/c bill; I keep the cooling on comfortable and also with heat.,,,,,,,,this fan circulates the air throughout the room and house. highly recommend this product. they last forever..it seems like that since I am just buying another one and the last was 20 years ago.
customer_reviews.author: em rogers

customer_reviews.title: you will definitely feel a nice draft/breeze. But it can be semi-noisy even if ...
customer_reviews.text: This fan does what it is suppose to. It circulates the air very well and you can feel the temperature go down. On the highest speed, you will definitely feel a nice draft/breeze. But it can be semi-noisy even if you have some music or television on. However, comfort over a bit of noise I say. If you use the medium or low setting, it is practically silent when matched with other noises such as outside ambient noise or indoor house noise. I look forward to using this fan a lot more when the weather gets very hot again.
customer_reviews.author: William F.

customer_reviews.title: All around junk that can't point downward.
customer_reviews.text: Forget about this junk if you need a fan than can be aimed downward. wasted money. too late to return. I didn't open the box until few days ago. and this fan is weak as they come and very flimsy stand. not solid.
customer_reviews.author: R. L

customer_reviews.title: ... is too noisy and the fan blade makes an annoying sound when it runs
customer_reviews.text: This fan is too noisy and the fan blade makes an annoying sound when it runs. Not nearly worth the money. Buy a cheaper fan and get the same experience. Very disappointed since I had another Vornado years ago and the quality was much better.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Dunlop

customer_reviews.title: This fan rules.
customer_reviews.text: I love this fan. In the summer, especially during heat waves, it cools my apartment better than a box fan and is much quieter. Now that it's cold, I actually have this and a little heater on, it circulates the heat so evenly in the room it's like m a g i c. If I just have the heater on, even on high, it just singes one part of me while the rest continues to freeze. I have both the fan and the heater on low right now and the whole room is nice and mild. This fan rules.
customer_reviews.author: TW

customer_reviews.title: Pretty small fan with power
customer_reviews.text: I have a love and hate relationship with this fan. The noise level two is Perfect for sleep, there are just some instances that this fan makes my throat dry for some reason. I don't even have this pointed on me. I only purchased this for a white noise and it works wonders but sometime it makes a weird rattling noise and I have to adjust it. It's a pretty fan, noise level is good, perfect circulation
customer_reviews.author: A.E

customer_reviews.title: Small package, huge performance.
customer_reviews.text: This fan is AWESOME! Not only does it outperform the 20" so-called cyclone fan that it replaced, it really moves air. I mean, really, really moves air, even at the lowest setting. Plus it takes up half the space of my previous fan. I use it in my bedroom for cooling and for white noise and it does both spectacularly. The highest setting is on the loud side, but that is what I prefer, because I'm usually the first one to bed, so I don't hear TV noise, dishes banging, my horrible, loud neighbors, nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Ken in MN

customer_reviews.title: Weaker than Expected
customer_reviews.text: I bought a different version at Costco and was excited for this brand since that fan moved a lot of air. This version however is your basic, run of the mill, average air pusher. I was very disappointed. I guess it moves air so that's one thing but the picture of it airing out an entire room is just false.
customer_reviews.author: karmaking2000

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good portable fan.
customer_reviews.text: Good value. It feels solid, and is heavier than most of the inexpensive fans I've used. Whether this means it will be more durable is not clear, however, but it probably has a more robust motor. The switch is a bit awkward and feels cheap, but it is reasonably convenient. At lower speeds, it is very quiet but moves air efficiently, so you don't have to turn it up to get good results. It is not intrusive when watching TV or listening to music at conversational levels. Ahh.
customer_reviews.author: Moburner

customer_reviews.title: Not quiet even on lowest setting but moves a lot of air.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only used this on 1st setting in a small room and it gets the job done. The room is uninsulated and even in the summer heat has helped cool off the room even if it is only slight. This is not a quiet fan, the previous model which is the same size is way quieter.
customer_reviews.author: chris v

customer_reviews.title: Oh how sweet it is
customer_reviews.text: I love this fan! It cools my small bedroom. I tried to use it in my living room during a heat wave in NY. I could not get cool, so I moved it into my bedroom. I go to bed feeling wonderful and wake up the same way. I even sometimes cover with a sheet. Oh how sweet it is to be cool during 100 degree weather. I just can't leave my bedroom :).
customer_reviews.author: Bajangirl66

customer_reviews.title: Powerful!!
customer_reviews.text: I live in Phoenix are summers are brutal. It’s the beginning of March and it’s already warming up. There is one room of my house that gets ridiculously hot and that is our bedroom. I bought the mid size fan and blackout curtains. It has helped TREMENDOUSLY!!!! I would say our bedroom is at very least 10 degrees cooler. I am extremely happy and am going to purchase the larger one for my living room/kitchen/dinning room since it is a very large open space that gets pretty warm when we cook. Couldn’t be happier with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Trujillo

customer_reviews.title: it really worked fine.
customer_reviews.text: My house has a separate room with ceiling windows.It was extremely warm in there. Although there are ac in the foyer connected to this area, it does not work to the space. With this, it really worked fine.
customer_reviews.author: keyjh001

customer_reviews.title: Vernado 630 A Disappointing Whole Room Heater
customer_reviews.text: This is 2 out of 3. The heater doesn't warm my room as well as my older Vernado heater did. I don't feel it's as powerful. What I don't like is the cover keeps coming off and when it falls on the floor it wakes me up. I would not buy this kind of heater again.
customer_reviews.author: J. Jurist

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE it!!
customer_reviews.text: I love that it circulates the air and there's also a breeze from it. I love that it's small and light enough to carry around from room to room where it's needed.... we even put it on the front porch when sitting out there in the evening to keep the mosquitos away from landing on us. I love that there's some noise to it as well because I need a bit of background white noise when I sleep, so it's perfect for that as well.
customer_reviews.author: Frank C.

customer_reviews.title: Nice strong breeze, but only lasted four months.
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about this fan... accept for the durability. It sports a nice strong breeze, solid foundation, and simple controls. However, it only took one fall from my desk to the carpeted floor at the hands (paws) of my cat to spell it’s demise. It was running at the time, and somehow one of the three blades snapped off. Now it’s not even or something, and when I turn it on it drunkenly bounces all over the place, and doesn’t produce any airflow. Judging by the price tag, I would expect a fair bit more longevity!
customer_reviews.author: Brawny

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced. Bad build quality.
customer_reviews.text: Just returned this... and I rarely write reviews - but I had to on this one - partly because I ignored all the bad reviews Especially after a great write up in Wirecutter, what do these Amazon customers know? I was wrong. It's overpriced. Way overpriced for a fan. I still bought it and then it randomly stopped working because of some kind of a wiring / electrical issue. I had also bought the Amazon Basics fan to compare and they work great - buy that instead.
customer_reviews.author: Michael C.

customer_reviews.title: Too expensive for what it does!
customer_reviews.text: Not particularly happy with this purchase, especially for the price. I had heard of this brand many times and expected much more. I have purchased smaller fans in the past for much less money that moved much more air. Would not buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Karin

customer_reviews.title: My mother's fan
customer_reviews.text: Just received my new fan and so far it is great. My mother bought a vornado fan around 30 years ago. She died 25 years ago and I brought it to my house where it has been used ever since. When we traveled in our motor home it was perfect for that. Now I am living in a small duplex and have used it here 18 years. It died last summer and, of course, I had to have another one. This one is a little larger and a bit noisier but still stirs the air perfectly. Hoping this one outlives me.
customer_reviews.author: barbara murray

customer_reviews.title: Best $65 ever spent.
customer_reviews.text: Quiet motor. Insanely great airflow. Great switch located on the side of the fan that lets you easily adjust the three different fan speeds.
customer_reviews.author: nopinkshirts

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed: Works great, but it's loud
customer_reviews.text: I had a slightly smaller, slightly older version of this fan that I loved, so I bought this one to replace it. I read Amazon and Google reviews that said this fan was quiet. My older one was, so between that and the reviews, I bought the 630. Unfortunately, this fan is surprisingly loud - even on the lowest setting. I'm very disappointed. I'm going to have to find something else that's quieter because for me, quiet is just as important as cooling.
customer_reviews.author: crestgirl69

customer_reviews.title: Died after less than 3 months
customer_reviews.text: Had since June 22nd and it died. So mad. I love(d) Vornado fans because of the power but honestly they had some issues. This one and the last one I bought...the housing over the blades comes off constantly! The plastic prongs holding it together break too easily. Super dangerous. Will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Mary B.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good!
customer_reviews.text: Sooooo... this is a powerful little fan! I do think other reviewers give it too much credit. It's too expensive and I didn't feel like it cooled an entire room. Great for small room but I found I have to have it directly on me to feel the affect I want out of it. There are 3 settings and all are kinda loud but not annoying. Don't expect to be able to hear the TV on the med or high setting. I use daily and sleep fine with it on.
customer_reviews.author: Shaykins

customer_reviews.title: Noisy but Powerful!  Circulates air like a beast!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this fan for some time and have had no trouble with it. It is very powerful and circulates air better than most fans I see in the stores. Although, it can be a bit noisy but that is not a negative for me as I enjoy the 'white noise' when I sleep. On low, it's decently quiet but I like powerful air circulation better on high. The Front guard is easy to remove when cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Salvatore N Guzzone

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our needs
customer_reviews.text: We brought this as an adjunct for a small space that we have. We pretty much use it year-round. Depending on your needs, it does have a medium range noise level but we tend to use it as white noise and find it soothing for those restless nights.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: I was a little bit skeptical about this product. But I was pleasantly surprised to find out how well it works. Just wow!!!! Room felt cooler and fresher. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Nani

customer_reviews.title: Powerful fan for size
customer_reviews.text: Bought this fan on the recommendation of Wirecutter. Powerful fan despite it's small size, very quiet and keeps me cool. And I got it at a discount from Amazon Warehouse! The only down side, there is no remote control option.
customer_reviews.author: gingc

customer_reviews.title: Mid size
customer_reviews.text: Overpriced quality plastic a bit on the noisy side but acceptable overall personally I’d like it if Vornado used a more powerful motor in the mid size and offer they’re vintage metal housing at this price point but to be clear I’m not complaining about the mid sized fans performance just wishful thinking I have two they’re pretty good
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Haugh

customer_reviews.title: The fan is not working properly. It should have been throw out and not sold to any customer.
customer_reviews.text: This is a used fan. It came in a box that looked like it was rescued from the trash can. I want a refund immediately. It will be dropped off at one of the site. It is a defective product that was returned by previous customer.
customer_reviews.author: myrna

customer_reviews.title: Study little fan, circulates the air perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend getting this brand name (not the knockoffs). I have these fans in every bedroom, cute and contemporary looking, not so bulky! Does the job of circulating the air perfectly. I keep them on the floor, they adjust, tilt towards wherever you need them. I've had them for a long time ... they last! Nice, in the winter I put them in the closet, fits neatly in the corner. Now I bought one for my son's dorm room.
customer_reviews.author: shopaholic9

customer_reviews.title: This is the 2nd Vornado Fan I purchased and returned ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd Vornado Fan I purchased and returned the next day!! I thought the first one was just a fluke when it started smoking and then stopped after just 10 mins but the 2nd one (the replacement) did exactly the same thing. Save your time and money and buy a different fan!
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Works well.
customer_reviews.text: I saw a review on Wirecutter for this product, and saw it was recommended. We had a tower fan that this replaced. Pleased with how the air circulator works. You can feel the air circulate in the room, and not having the air blow directly on you as with the tower fan we were using. Works very well.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Broke after less than a year
customer_reviews.text: I bought this fan back in January of 2019, and it broke in October, conveniently after the warranty period. Now the fan doesn't turn on or operate at all.
customer_reviews.author: D. Lee

customer_reviews.title: THE SILENT, STRONG TYPE
customer_reviews.text: It moves stale air around, uniformly refreshing the surroundings. Much better than stationary and oscillating fans. If you have air conditioner in the same room, the Vornado increase the power of the AC, maximizing cooling and, at the same, minimizing costs - as, of course, ACs consume much more energy than fans.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Merrimack

customer_reviews.title: Extremely overpriced for its poor performance
customer_reviews.text: Definitely does not circulate the air in the entire room as it advertises. Not sure if the fluid dynamics of the airflow it advertises is even possible. Works like a normal fan that can't rotate automatically, except the volume of air that is cooled is very small since the fan is so small. Also extremely loud. 1 star, would not recommend at all.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: The little fan that could
customer_reviews.text: While not quite as quiet as advertised, this fan moves a lot of air considering its size. It has probably saved us far more than what we paid for it in electricity not used for a.c.
customer_reviews.author: Michael A. Levine

customer_reviews.title: This fan works great when it is new
customer_reviews.text: I have bought two of these fans in the past 2 years and they have both broken down. I contacted Amazon regarding the first purchase and they sent me the second one. When I called to see if I can get a replacement on the second model they said I would have to call the manufacturer and deal with them (even though I took out the 2 year warranty on both). Do not buy this model........I will never purchase from them again.
customer_reviews.author: IRISH

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Overall it’s a good fan, very durable and seems to circulate the air quite well. The bad: it’s smaller sized that you would expect. We got the mid size but it’s actually more like small size fan. It’s quite noisy I guess due to shape and the angle of the fan blades and finally the on and off switch is abit awkward positioned.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does what a fan does.... blows hard.
customer_reviews.text: If you need something to circulate air for an average sized room then this will do it for a fairly decent price. My first one has been on and running for almost 3 years straight only time it stops is for cleaning can't complain. It was a bit warmer this summer so I added another to my arsenal and I'm pleased with the results.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Hawkinya

customer_reviews.title: A Durable and Powerful Fan
customer_reviews.text: Given that small table fans I've purchased in the past tend to die after 1-2 years max, I was looking for something that would last longer. I was persuaded to purchase b/c of Vornado's 5 yr. warranty. I can't speak to the longevity as of yet, but the fan seems very durable, though with the all-plastic construction, it's kind of cheap feeling. However, it does the intended job, pushes a lot of air. Very neutral sound on low setting, medium makes a bit of noise, though I can still sleep through it, and high power makes a bedroom feel like it's in the middle of a wind tunnel.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew King

customer_reviews.title: I love it.
customer_reviews.text: You can put this fan in a large room and it will easily recirculate the air. Unlike many rotating fans that produce a fairly weak air stream and rely on oscillation to cover more area, the Vornado 630 creates a strong yet smooth stream that pushes the air around the whole room.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Great fan for an RV
customer_reviews.text: A little fan that moves a lot of air. I got it for our RV. It's strong enough to move air through the main living area. It's sturdy and can be put in a variety of places. Perfect fan for the RV and any small room. It's very pricey in my opinion, but I found it worth it because of the size, sturdiness and air movement I needed in the RV.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cools the room
customer_reviews.text: The fan provides very good cool air. It is not quiet for sleeping.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara J.

customer_reviews.title: Overall worthwhile
customer_reviews.text: Impressively quiet (though certainly not silent) compared to the volume of air that it circulates. Sturdy, generally unobstrusive. Efficient. It's not going to generate a hurricane for you, but nicer than a big box fan and a bit more versatile design. A fair choice at a good price point.
customer_reviews.author: Colonel Kurtz

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: This is a powerful fan that blows air all over the room, it seems like, and really keeps it cool! So glad I got it! This is a good brand and a quality product at a decent price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Annoying hum at low and medium speeds
customer_reviews.text: There are three speeds on this fan. On low and medium setting, there is a discernable hum. On the high setting, there is no hum but the fan noise is pretty loud. Won't work if you are a light sleeper or need to use the fan in any setting where fan noise is an issue, such as tutoring room or home theater room, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: No other fan like it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this fan for my son and his pregnant girlfriend's apartment. Their AC unit was struggling to keep the 600 square foot space cool during the Texas Summer. I have some version of the Vornado in every room in my house. I'm able to keep my electric bill down by having the thermostat on maybe 73 during the day and letting the fans circulate the cool air! There is no other fan that I've ever used that actually helps in Texas! I bought this one for their living room and the smaller version for their bedroom and they are thrilled!
customer_reviews.author: LadyP

customer_reviews.title: Fine but too powerful.
customer_reviews.text: Solidly built—no flimsy plastic. Only problem is that on lowest setting it’s still too powerful. Obviously excellent choice if you want a small fan with high intensity air flow.
customer_reviews.author: ira feirstein

product_meta.title: Vornado 630 Mid-Size Whole Room Air Circulator Fan
product_meta.description:
Style Name:Air Circulator FanThe Vornado 630 Mid-Size Whole Room Air Circulator continues Vornado's superior benchmark performance with a new edge definition design. With its unique signature grill and deep-pitched propeller, the 630 moves air up to 70 feet while aerodynamically circulating all the air in a room. The 3-speed control, located on the side of the air circulator's base, is easy to access and allows for speed selection to meet any circulation need. The base of the 630 provides added stability when operating from the floor or desktop. Use the 630 all year long in the home or office for added comfort and energy savings in every season. Backed by a 5-year limited warranty. Model is made for 120 volts only.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
IMPORTANT INTERNATIONAL DISCLAIMER: This item is built to meet U.S. voltage requirements and may not function properly when used in conjunction with external devices that alter or convert voltage or frequency of electricity. Improper use or shipping the product outside the U.S. will void all warranties.
feature_bullets: VORTEX ACTION — Utilizes Vornado's signature Vortex air circulation to more effectively move air throughout a room.
SIMPLE CONTROLS — The 3-speed manual control is easy to use and allows you to dial in your comfort.
MULTI-DIRECTIONAL AIRFLOW — Equipped with an adjustable tilt head that allows you to direct the air where you need it.
OPTIMUM PERFORMANCE — Deep-pitched blades paired with an inlet guide cone, enclosed air duct, and spiral grill help move air up to 70 ft.
SUPERIOR SUPPORT — Backed by a 5-year hassle-free and supported by a customer service team based in Andover, KS.
Built to meet U. S. voltage requirements. Certified, safety-tested, and warrantied for use only in the U. S; Power Cord Plug Type: 2-Pin Polarized

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars3,336 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
